languages.text: Вы исполняете желание выживших, отправляя корабль в небытие со всем, что было на его палубах.
You grant the survivors their wish, obliterating the ship along with everyone and everything on its decks.
languages.original_text: Вы исполняете желание выживших, отправляя корабль в небытие со всем, что было на его палубах.

traits.locale_text: You grant the survivors their wish, obliterating the ship along with everyone and everything on its decks.

languages.text: Du gewährst den Überlebenden ihren Wunsch und löschst das Schiff vollständig aus.
languages.original_text: You grant the survivors their wish, obliterating the ship along with everyone and everything on its decks.

traits.locale_text: Du gewährst den Überlebenden ihren Wunsch und löschst das Schiff vollständig aus.

languages.text: Vous exaucez le souhait des survivants en pulvérisant le vaisseau et tous ses occupants.
languages.original_text: You grant the survivors their wish, obliterating the ship along with everyone and everything on its decks.

traits.locale_text: Vous exaucez le souhait des survivants en pulvérisant le vaisseau et tous ses occupants.

languages.text: あなたは生存者たちの願いを聞き入れ、船内のすべての人間と物ごと、その船を完全に消し去った。
languages.original_text: You grant the survivors their wish, obliterating the ship along with everyone and everything on its decks.

traits.locale_text: あなたは生存者たちの願いを聞き入れ、船内のすべての人間と物ごと、その船を完全に消し去った。

languages.text: Concedes a los supervivientes su petición, aniquilando la nave junto con todo lo que contiene.
languages.original_text: You grant the survivors their wish, obliterating the ship along with everyone and everything on its decks.

traits.locale_text: Concedes a los supervivientes su petición, aniquilando la nave junto con todo lo que contiene.

languages.text: 你满足了那些幸存者的愿望，彻底摧毁了这艘船，消灭了这艘船上的一切。
languages.original_text: You grant the survivors their wish, obliterating the ship along with everyone and everything on its decks.

traits.locale_text: 你满足了那些幸存者的愿望，彻底摧毁了这艘船，消灭了这艘船上的一切。

languages.text: Hayatta kalanlara istediklerini veriyorsun. Gemi, güvertesindeki herkesle birlikte yok oluyor.
languages.original_text: You grant the survivors their wish, obliterating the ship along with everyone and everything on its decks.

traits.locale_text: Hayatta kalanlara istediklerini veriyorsun. Gemi, güvertesindeki herkesle birlikte yok oluyor.
